title: Cant submit a ticket
body: I cant submit a ticket, even tho my email is verified it wont allow me to do so. Can I submit a ticket here instead? Will riot read it and perhaps help me? Its quite frustrating to be in this situation.

replies.body: Hey, are you getting any errors while submitting a ticket?  If you continue to have issues, you can email us directly via support@riotgames.com.
